headline: BNPL still in 'early days' in US as Zip Co enters the scene: CEO
summary: Klarna (KLAR) will debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Wednesday, pricing its IPO at $40 per share. Is the Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) space starting to look a little cramped in the United States? Zip Co (ASX: ZIP.AX) US CEO Joe Heck comes on Market Catalysts to talk about the type of competition seen in the US landscape for BNPL. The Australia-based fintech company is currently planning a dual listing on the Nasdaq. Also catch Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with Affirm (AFRM) CEO Max Levchin. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
